attributes.action: stop motorway hogging of middle and third lanes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All Motorway overhead information gantries to show stop hogging middle and third lanes.
Plus painted on middle and third lane stop hogging middle lane.
Too many people sit in the middle and third lane at 50 to 65 mph for no apparent reason when they should be in lane one.
This is to advise and educate drivers, too many drivers are unaware of motorway etiquette.
